title: Got leaverbustered for client bugging and not connecting! not my fault!
body:
idk if i am posting this in the right place, but i got set on leaverbuster for 5 games all because my game refused to load in, i ended up having to restart my entire computer, because it got stuck in a cycle of loading and crashing..
i'll admit that i've left games and deserved the leaverbusters i've gotten for those, but this particular time it wasn't my fault..
if this is just something i have to deal with, that's fine.. but is probably something that should be looked into, and worked on, because players shouldn't be punished when the client glitches out like that..

replies.body:
We should definitely look into why you kept crashing or couldn't connect, but overall we can't lift leaverbusters since the other players were still impacted by the accidental leaves.

Sometimes the game won't load correctly if firewalls are blocking your network from our servers. It's not always very obvious where the problem lies exactly, but it's a good start to [**troubleshoot your firewalls with these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3). Test those steps in a custom or practice game, and let me know if it's not helping.
